A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Walked into The Last Jedi with very high hopes\, but walked out very disappointed.  The story was not the engaging adventure of cunning characters you look forward to from Star Wars.  Instead\, it felt like a comic book movie with cheap jokes and lengthy plot-lines that went nowhere. I also did not like how Luke's character was handled one bit. Hopefully Ep9 will not be anything like this and saves this trilogy.
